questions.question: What is a data structure?
options: A way to store and organize data
questions.correctAnswer: A way to store and organize data

questions.question: What is an array?
options: A collection of elements of the same type
questions.correctAnswer: A collection of elements of the same type

questions.question: What is a linked list?
options: A collection of nodes that are connected
questions.correctAnswer: A collection of nodes that are connected

questions.question: What is a stack?
options: A linear data structure that follows Last In First Out (LIFO)
A linear data structure that follows First In First Out (FIFO)
questions.correctAnswer: A linear data structure that follows Last In First Out (LIFO)

questions.question: What is a queue?
options: A linear data structure that follows First In First Out (FIFO)
A linear data structure that follows LIFO
questions.correctAnswer: A linear data structure that follows First In First Out (FIFO)

questions.question: What is a binary tree?
options: A tree data structure in which each node has at most two children
questions.correctAnswer: A tree data structure in which each node has at most two children

questions.question: What is a hash table?
options: A data structure that implements an associative array
questions.correctAnswer: A data structure that implements an associative array

questions.question: What is a graph?
options: A collection of nodes connected by edges
questions.correctAnswer: A collection of nodes connected by edges

questions.question: What is the main advantage of using a linked list over an array?
options: Dynamic size and ease of insertion/deletion
questions.correctAnswer: Dynamic size and ease of insertion/deletion
